STEP 5 - MONITORING & FOLLOW-UP STRATEGY: I'll establish appropriate monitoring and follow-up care. - Follow-up timeline: Reassess in 1-2 weeks after initial diagnostics; post-procedure follow-up as indicated. - Monitoring parameters: Abdominal exam, symptom progression, signs of complications. - Red flag symptoms: Sudden worsening pain, jaundice, fever, or signs of bleeding. - Treatment response assessment: Resolution or stabilization of swelling, diagnostic confirmation.
